website_summaries.verdict: With cavities that measure 4 inches in diameter, this pan is a solid choice if you prefer extra-wide muffin tops or need a muffin top pan primarily for making buns.
pros: Wider than average cavities are fantastic for buns, baked breakfast sandwich fillings, or generously-sized muffin tops
Non-stick coating for easier removal and cleaning
Includes a few recipes to get you off to a great start
Handles make for easier removal with oven mitts
cons: Non-stick coating requires gentle handling and washing

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pan to bake eggs for breakfast sandwiches!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan!!! I bought it to bake eggs for breakfast sandwiches and I couldn't possibly be happier with it! You can fit one egg in each cup and they are the exact size of an English muffin. I sprayed the pan with a little canola cooking spray even though it's non stick. The eggs did not stick even a tiny little bit! You can see the picture I included to see how clean the pan came out! I absolutely love this pan!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for making Keto buns
customer_reviews.text: this pan worked great to make keto friendly buns! Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy breakfast.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to make egg bakes. Eggs, hash browns, shredded cheese, onion - 350 degrees for 15 min. They slip right out of the pan. Make ahead and only have to reheat in microwave. Easy breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: MKG

customer_reviews.title: Great for making Egg-McMuffin-ish type breakfast sandwiches to reheat all week.
customer_reviews.text: Nice construction. Easy to clean. With a little oil spray, these remove easily with very little stickiness. I use these on the weekend to make egg and cheese mini-omelettes which I freeze for breakfast on-the-go (with an english muffin) all week. I often add onions, green peppers or roasted red peppers but since these aren't very deep, it's best to chop those additions very small as they're going to take up much of the 'egg space'.
customer_reviews.author: R. G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for our low carb lifestyle
customer_reviews.text: We make low carb almond buns, flax buns and revolution rolls with this pan. It works well and is the perfect size for the recipes.
customer_reviews.author: UneBelleFemme

customer_reviews.title: I can think of so many great uses for this pan!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for making my flaxseed meal buns for hamburgers and breakfast sandwiches. A great tool for those on a ketogenic diet. This is a high quality pan. No warping under heat in the oven. Great non stick surface! This pan is great for a multitude of uses. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: TAMMY L NORRBOM

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: We loved this pan. greased it with a tad of butter first. Baked eggs, muffin tops, and chocolate chip cookies in it. Washed of perfectly each time. Would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Hazel

customer_reviews.title: com/caveman-keto-recipes-almond-buns/ They are the BEST! I use it to make a bun for ...
customer_reviews.text: I eat a low carb, keto diet. I use the muffin top pan for making almond buns. You can find a recipe for almond buns on Caveman Keto's website.[...] They are the BEST! I use it to make a bun for an egg and bacon sandwich on weekend mornings. One of the few kitchen gadgets that are for a specific use that I really enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like it very much, the bigger size was exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Steve P. Paynter

customer_reviews.title: Nice size but eggs stick to pan
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this pan to make eggs to serve on bagels and muffins. The size is just right. Eggs need about 8 min in the oven at 350 degrees. However, the eggs really stick to this pan. I have used different oils and none stick sprays but it still sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Silvana

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Sometimes you don’t want a big muffin, this thing is great.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: They work for rolls perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I have a recipe for gluten free hamburger rolls and could never get them perfectly shaped, until I found these! They work great, are easy to store and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Country Reader

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for burger buns
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a long time to find a pan to use for making burger buns. This works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: KulaLani

customer_reviews.title: Better than my old ones where the recess is welded ...
customer_reviews.text: Better than my old ones where the recess is welded onto the sheet. So far they work great for muffin tops and cookies.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne McCloud

customer_reviews.title: ... multiple eggs at once and it is has been great so far
customer_reviews.text: I use this to bake multiple eggs at once and it is has been great so far. Not really a baker, but this product fit my needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great As Bun Pans
customer_reviews.text: I use these pans for making hamburger buns. They work perfectly, clean up easily, and look great too. I bought 2 so I can bake a dozen buns at once. Makes 4" buns...plenty big for anything you need, but not too over-sized. The non-stick surfaced had a couple of scratches in it when they arrived, but the scratches are not in the bun circles themselves so it was not too big of an issue for me. Overall - great product.
customer_reviews.author: ddbunbo

customer_reviews.title: Works the way it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what it supposed to be. Love it when I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A.

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! My zucchini muffin tops come out great! Will be using these often to make different toaster muffins. Nice having them handy for an easy breakfast or even snack.
customer_reviews.author: JanetM

customer_reviews.title: Great for backing muffin tops
customer_reviews.text: Great item. I use this about 2x a week to make my favorites. Good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: SLW

customer_reviews.title: Pefect for Keto
customer_reviews.text: I use this for keto cheese buns. Its perfect for that.
customer_reviews.author: Lucasberg

customer_reviews.title: Muffin top pans
customer_reviews.text: The muffin top pans are fantastic, my cloud bread baked in 10 min. I purchased two, so I bake a dozen at a time. I like the 4 Inc size.
customer_reviews.author: Bren

customer_reviews.title: Best way to make muffins
customer_reviews.text: This muffin top pan is great. it makes large size muffin tops, perfect for freezing and then putting in toaster. I bought these pans for gifts for everyone in the office at Christmas and everyone loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Bonita A Posnak

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for making eggs for breakfast sandwiches. 15 mins on 350. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Thorne

customer_reviews.title: ... ahead egg sandwiches and I have to say it's perfect for a large scrambled egg and a dash of ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for make ahead egg sandwiches and I have to say it's perfect for a large scrambled egg and a dash of milk! The egg pucks fit perfectly on an english muffin and store really well.
customer_reviews.author: Cait C

customer_reviews.title: Baking times differ a little from deeper recipes
customer_reviews.text: Blueberry muffin tops for breakfast and corn muffin tops to go with chili and also with jambalaya.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size holes for making hamburger buns. I may order another one in the future.
customer_reviews.author: SueB

customer_reviews.title: Not very non stick
customer_reviews.text: These aren’t my favorite pans. They aren’t very non stick eve with baking spray.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great for "buns"
customer_reviews.text: We are a keto family and I needed a pan for making almond buns. (For sandwiches, etc). Great size for this! Quality seems good and is nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Toby

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Got to make egg sandwiches. Perfect. Easy to remove and clean
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Lamay

customer_reviews.title: It is awesome. Nothing sticks to it
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. Quick shipping. I use it for Paleo cooking of my breads and some desserts. It is awesome. Nothing sticks to it. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Parks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great pan.. Just was i was looking for to make cornbread toasties.. Love it
customer_reviews.author: crg

customer_reviews.title: SALMON BURGER BUNS
customer_reviews.text: WORKS GREAT FOR MAKING SALMON BURGER BUNS WITH ZERO SODIUM ADDED. STORE BOUGHT BUNS ARE LOADED WITH SODIUM. THE 4" DIAMETER IS A PERFECT SIZE.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This muffin top pan works perfectly for my baking project.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for ketoers!
customer_reviews.text: You can use it for eggs, cookies, keto bread replacements, crusts, the list goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnda Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: It does what it was designed to do. It also makes the perfect size of burger buns
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: love this pan
customer_reviews.text: love this pan. I make my special chocolate chip cookies in them and sell them. They are all the same size and perfect
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: great for egg
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to bake your eggs for an english muffin sandwich. Making this review with a full belly mmmmmmm.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: it looked like the item as shown
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it yet ,shipping was quick.it looked like the item as shown ,I van not wait to make my half moons with it
customer_reviews.author: melanie j ciborski

customer_reviews.title: I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Wife has already made muffin tops with them and they did very well. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Great for Egg Patties
customer_reviews.text: I use this to make egg white patties for my weekday breakfasts. It makes a patty that is the perfect size and thickness for a english muffin breakfast sandwich. I do use a little Pam first to make it easier to get the egg out. 15 minutes in a 350 degree oven and you're good.
customer_reviews.author: Trixi C.

customer_reviews.title: The pan is easy to oil and easy to clean afterwards
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it's supposed to do. Makes a very neat round bun or muffin shape from a dough that would otherwise have messy edges or spread too much. The pan is easy to oil and easy to clean afterwards. A thoroughly satisfactory product.
customer_reviews.author: Hilarey Ranger

customer_reviews.title: love this!
customer_reviews.text: love it, use it all the time for many things.
customer_reviews.author: Joan S. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Muffin Pan
customer_reviews.text: I've only used the pan once, but so far it has met all of my expectations. The non-stick surface does a great job at preventing my baked goods from sticking to the pan. :)
customer_reviews.author: Powie

customer_reviews.title: Pan
customer_reviews.text: We got this item in the mail really fast,have to say I have not got to use it yet though,hopefully soon.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Muffin pan
customer_reviews.text: Not the pan that I expected. I take too much dough to fill the cup and it doesn't run over the top to make a top like a muffin has. This is called a puffy muffin crown pan not a muffin top pan. Will probally have to purchase a muffin top pan.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. S.

customer_reviews.title: Can hardly wait to use it.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I have been working too much this month to have time to bake anything. However, in May I am going to try the pan and then I can let you know for sure how it worked. Needless to say I am so happy to have one I have wanted one for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: bakingnut

customer_reviews.title: after 2 years, non stick no longer works
customer_reviews.text: so far so good. This pan is one piece. The other I purchased (12 muffin pan) the cups were a separate piece fitted in place and made cleaning really difficult. Also non-stick was not great. This pan, muffin or eggs slip right out. Can clean with cloth which preserves the nonstick. Also, I bake eggs in the pan and the larger size fits my bagel perfectly. UPDATE 6/4/19 - non stick has worn off. I use these to bake eggs and the eggs rip apart after I remove from oven. Cooking spray is not enough anymore. I have to buy new pans and it won't be these
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad Product Design
customer_reviews.text: Terrible execution! The edges of the pan are on the same level as the bottom of the pan. That means your fingers touch the hot oven surface when you place it on the preaheated oven rack! I can’t believe people rated this product highly. It’s a recipe for burned fingers unless you put it on top of yet another pan/rack etc. You could use oven mitts but then they get in the way as you set it down and you run the risk of spills. 👎
customer_reviews.author: Theodore T.

customer_reviews.title: For keto hamburger buns
customer_reviews.text: I am sure you will find many uses for this pan. I bought it for making keto hambuger buns. The size is perfect for hamburgers.
customer_reviews.author: Emerald Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Eggs stick :(
customer_reviews.text: Is there such a thing as nonstick with EGGS? I use this pan to cook a half dozen eggs for breakfast sandwiches, and just like my previous brand of pan... the eggs still stick. Even with a light wipe of coconut oil. Maybe it's just a fact of life?
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Keto buns
customer_reviews.text: I saw a video on making keto style buns and they recommended muffin top pans, so I thought I would give it a try. The pan works great and makes awesome buns to use for my burgers and various sandwiches. Will definitely continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: ronny chea

customer_reviews.title: Spray the circle
customer_reviews.text: Make nice cookies for my Whoopi pies but you really need to spray the disc and flatten out the dough so it's as big as the circle And I thought it was quite expensive for what it is. It
customer_reviews.author: Sissy

customer_reviews.title: Nonstick coating is wearing out pretty quickly at this point
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these to bake eggs for breakfast sandwiches for about 2 months now. Nonstick coating is wearing out pretty quickly at this point. Works great for it's intended use as well, but especially perfect for an egg cooked at just the right size for a sandwich. However, going to have to purchase more because it's a mess to clean off the egg now.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: The material seems thin but strong. I purchased this to make my own hamburger buns and they are a little bit smaller than what you would purchase in a store. I'm happy with the quality of it and would purchase this same brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Love my corn tosties
customer_reviews.text: This pan works very well for my corn tosties. Non-stick is as described and no oil is needed. As others have said, it is somewhat hard to remove from a hot oven (hence the 4 star rating) but I haven't gotten burned yet after several batches. I would buy this item again, and recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Less than 0.5 inches deep
customer_reviews.text: More like 3/8 which was too shallow for our intended use. It was nice in all other aspects including weight, size, and convenient handles, from a brand we trust.
customer_reviews.author: Brook Worm

customer_reviews.title: Great Pan!
customer_reviews.text: This pan is so good for making large cookies or having a large muffin top. Quality pan and even though I use cooking spray, it shows no signs of sticking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bun / Whoopie pan
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. We're low-carbers... and use this to make "Oopsie" rolls. Works perfect - the "standard" method comes out a bit flat. This makes all the difference! Yay! bread!
customer_reviews.author: exotec

customer_reviews.title: Great pan!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned by some of the reviews stating that this pan had a problem with sticking. I am happy to report my keto sandwich thins came out easily and with zero sticking. I have just ordered another one so I can bake more at one time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is a NON non stick pan
customer_reviews.text: This pan is supposed to be non-stick. Well, even putting oil on it, my food stuck. very disappointed. I bought this purposely to make bread rounds for a low carb diet. to clean, I have to soak in water for 2 days. wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: love this pan! make ahead eggs & breakfast meat/veggies for perfect breakfast sandwiches
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: They arrived on time.
customer_reviews.text: It was to big for my oven so I did not get to use it but would love to have.
customer_reviews.author: Dee D.

customer_reviews.title: It's just as I ordered, well pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this muffin top pan and it is extremely good quality and was just as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Mz Linda

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning’s a breeze
customer_reviews.text: This is second one i’ve purchased. Now i can make all 12 muffin tops at once! Really like that the surface is smooth at cups and at edge. Makes cleaning it super easy.
customer_reviews.author: MKR

customer_reviews.title: Yorkshire Pudding
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the purchase. Perfect for making Yorkshire Pudding.
customer_reviews.author: prettybama

customer_reviews.title: The Muffin Top size is the best!
customer_reviews.text: Boy! I wish I had purchased this long ago. I would, however, like the handled to be raised to more easily get off the oven rack. It is flat against the hot rack. Otherwise I love the size of the muffin top. I also use it for making some of the Paleo breads. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Cooks Eggs for Breakfast Sandwiches!
customer_reviews.text: Using these to bake eggs to freeze with pre-made breakfast sandwiches and it's working out swimmingly! Perfect size. Tried a muffin pan but if you put the egg on a normal bagel thin or english muffin, you're left with quite a bit of surface area on the bread uncovered by egg. So this is a great solution! Bakes evenly and quickly, clean-up is a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Upstate NY

customer_reviews.title: This pan is sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: This pan is sturdy and well made. The nonstick surface works well. However, it is not deep enough for my purpose. I was looking for a pan that could make English Muffin sized bread. The diameter is perfect, but the depth is way too shallow. Great for making eggs, but not gluten free muffins. I have since purchased a similar pan with deeper indents that works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Board Gamer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with the quality. Just don't use as the depressions are too shallow for buns or ems.
customer_reviews.author: wild bill

customer_reviews.title: It is strongly made. The circle is 4 inch ...
customer_reviews.text: It is strongly made. The circle is 4 inch exact. The produce do not stick to the pan at all. However the round-inside-corner make product flip out, at each time you touch the produce.
customer_reviews.author: Alain Lamontagne

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but very shallow
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made pan and it bakes well. I really can't say anything negative. I just found the time to be very shallow, a little too shallow to really get a good end result. I know muffin tops aren't supposed to be deep, but I would prefer something just a little deeper.
customer_reviews.author: Gina B

customer_reviews.title: Non stick part is great but everything I've baked on this burns
customer_reviews.text: Non stick part is great but everything I've baked on this burns. And it's not me as a cook! :-) I've tried backing off on the temperature, different rack settings, and bake times...nothing helps.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly F

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great size. Well made. Non stick but still benefits from a little oil.
customer_reviews.author: pegmckpt

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Was worth the price for making muffin top breads! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Melina E Alas

customer_reviews.title: There is a problem with the none stick
customer_reviews.text: The best part of a muffin is the top! After using it for more than 6 month's I can definitely say that there is a problem with the none stick. I used all kinds of oils and butter and the mixture sticks. Both a different one and it's a miracle nothing sticks :-/
customer_reviews.author: Odeliaa

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This pan is nice and sturdy and nonstick. Easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Saenz

customer_reviews.title: Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this for all sorts of recipes. Great for Keto Bread.
customer_reviews.author: Mommajomma

customer_reviews.title: It'll fit the ticket more than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Got it so that I could cook up some scrambled eggs to make our own breakfast sandwiches. Depth is perfect. Non-stick finish is a bonus. Think you'll even be happy baking those muffin tops that this was designed for....but I haven't gotten there yet. Wanted to point out it can have multiple uses.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this pan - use it to make eggs for breakfast muffins....works so well!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Westhoff

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Muffin Top Pan
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what it's intended for. Good quality, no complaints. Hard to find item in our local stores.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing better
customer_reviews.text: On Ideal Protein and this makes a great IP baked giids
customer_reviews.author: Todd J King

customer_reviews.title: Great for making homemade sandwich rounds - fit into Breakfast Sandwich maker
customer_reviews.text: I use this to make Gluten Free sandwich rounds to use in our Breakfast Sandwich Maker. Works great.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: just what I was looking for as you cant get these in Australia
customer_reviews.author: Dawny

customer_reviews.title: Multi-use product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I use it to make bread rolls, buns etc. Just the right size. easy to handle, and very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D

customer_reviews.title: Make you own Muffin Tops !
customer_reviews.text: Make you own Muffin Tops at a fraction of the price....and to your taste! Nice item well made. Family loves the final product !
customer_reviews.author: David N. Bergeron

customer_reviews.title: Great for breakfast sandwiches
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to make my own egg patties for breakfast sandwiches. They are the perfect size to go on an english muffin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much better tasting than Dutch Brow that cost me $2 a
customer_reviews.text: Yummy muffin tops that cost pennies to cook up! Much better tasting than Dutch Brow that cost me $2 a pop
customer_reviews.author: Becky N.

customer_reviews.title: Pan works great for precooking 2 eggs in the oven
customer_reviews.text: Pan works great for precooking 2 eggs in the oven. Makes for a great, high quality breakfast bagel in the coffee shop.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee time?

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I received this product in a very timely manor. Very easy to clean. I wish it was a bit sturdier and thicker, but otherwise a great pan :) cooks very evenly
customer_reviews.author: SIRENA

customer_reviews.title: ok, but be careful with the nonstick surface!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for making hamburger buns and muffin tops but watch out for the nonstick surface- it scratches off very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Maddycat

customer_reviews.title: great for individual items baked at once!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome pan! We use it for a number of things, not just muffins. Glad it was available!!
customer_reviews.author: Holly How

customer_reviews.title: Much Ado About Muffins
customer_reviews.text: These pans have made great muffin tops. They brown beautifully and come out of the pan easily. I especially like the entensions at each end which make it much easier to handle the pans.
customer_reviews.author: GT

customer_reviews.title: Also great for making any gluten free biscuit or muffin that ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this pan for making Gluten Free sandwich rolls. Also great for making any gluten free biscuit or muffin that tends to spread out. The pan is very non stick. I lightly greased them with coconut oil and everything just falls out without even needing to touch them! Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: If you don't have feelings in your fingertips this pan is perfect for you
customer_reviews.text: This pan, without a doubt, is one of the worst pans I have ever purchased. The first time using it to bake eggs, 5 of 6 were stuck. The eggs were incredibly difficult to remove even after soaking. It is dangerous to put in the oven because of the way the handles and edges are shaped. everything is pointed down which makes them very convenient to stack many identical pans on top of each other, but very difficult to place or remove from an oven rack with or without an oven mitt.
customer_reviews.author: Issac R.

product_meta.title: Norpro Puffy Muffin Top Pan Makes 6 Non Stick High Rise Crown 4" Wide .5" Deep
product_meta.description: Measures: 17.25" X 11.25" X .5"/ 44cm x 28.5cm x 1.25cm. Muffin crowns are indeed the best part of the muffin! Create 6 high-rise muffin crowns. Each cup: 4”/10 cm wide and .5”/1.25cm deep. Professional quality nonstick pan provides even heating for uniform baking. Great for making egg bakes, the perfect size for an English muffin egg sandwich! Make low carb almond buns, flaxseed meal buns, revolution rolls, homemade gluten free hamburger buns, and much more! Also great for making large cookies, The perfect uniform size and thickness! Recipes and instructions included.
feature_bullets: Muffin crowns are indeed the best part of the muffin!
Create 6 high-rise muffin crowns. Each cup: 4”/10 cm wide and .5”/1.25cm deep.
Professional quality nonstick pan provides even heating for uniform baking.
Great for making egg bakes, the perfect size for an English muffin egg sandwich!
Make low carb almond buns, flaxseed meal buns, Revolution rolls, homemade gluten free Hamburger buns, and much more!
Also great for making large cookies, The perfect uniform size and thickness!
